title: The game ended and i'm still in it
body: The game crashed in the middle and I couldn't connect it passed 30-45 min and i still cant connect to the client its been 2 hours and it acts like im still in a game a tried even tho the game ended and it acts like im in the game that ended please unbug my account and help me if possible

replies.body:
What ISP are you using?  I've been seeing a few reports like this from EU players getting stuck at reconnect, and believe it may be due to a routing issue.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to the EUW game server for about 5 minutes: 192.64.170.252

This will help us find any snags along the way.
in eu server got same problem stuck
